title: Kalevala: The New Era
occurrences: Will there be war, Vainamoinen? Will they destroy the village of Kalevala?
Kalevala hasn't sought power, nor taken it from anyone.
We've had enough of Kalevala's peace, my father's songs.
You know the power of Kalevala.
said a man of your grit ought to be the warlord of Kalevala.

And that there are no other chiefs in Kalevala than Vainamoinen.
We want to see you ruling the lands of Kalevala.
This Kalevala cannot give you.

Kullervo? But he has left Kalevala to live alone in the woods.
In his heart he still belongs to the holy tribe of Kalevala.
Which you also used to have, when you fought at the gates of Kalevala.

arrived here to conquer new lands. And to bring a new era with them.
